product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry Bag
long_description: The Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry bag is for weight-conscious travelers. And although made from a lightweight fabric, this bag stands up on its own so it's easy to access the contents. Two internal mesh pockets and a zip-close exterior pocket. YKK(TM) zippers with Hypalon(TM) grab tabs provide reliable opening and closing. Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry bag is crafted from super lightweight, strong and water-resistant Ultra-Sil(TM) nylon fabric made with durable Cordura(R) yarns.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Travelling Light Toiletry bag is for weight-conscious travelers. And although made from a lightweight fabric, this bag stands up on its own so it's easy to access the contents.
